Room.Name: Lelion Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lelion Way, between the Lithium Inlet on the north side of the road and the Lithium Bay Boat Tours building on the south.
Room.LongDescription: Lithium Bay Boat Tours provides its customers with various tours of the Bay and the river that drains into the bay. Maps are also available. The Lithium Inlet leads east into the city, eventually forming Lyanden Lake.
